title: Rethinking Afghanistan (movie review)
content: This documentary, directed by Robert Greenwald, ends on an upbeat note, showing how international aid organizations, doctors without border types, are making a positive difference in Afghanistan.[The LAWCAP puppet](http://mybizmo.blogspot.com/2008/05/carrier-movie-review.html) (or so-called USA (see Grunch of Giants)) has completely lost the war for hearts and minds, has no hope of victory whatsoever (not news).
author: Kirby Urner
